name: Digital Warranty Card Generator
author: coder426

sections.description:
Digital Warranty Card Generator WordPress Plugin as the name suggests this Plugin can be used for generating Digital Warranty Cards for your Products. If you have an ecommerce website then you can provide your customer with such Digital Warranty Cards which not only boost your sales but also help you to earn more trust. You can also configure or change the settings to convert warranty cards to be used as Digital Gift Cards.

Whether its a festive season or a sale, if you sell physical products then such digital warranty cards will be useful to earn buyer’s trust. You can not only use this cards for one time but also for recurring purposes if you provide recurring warranty business too like we see now days in many laptop companies. They charge for increasing the warranty of their products.

Key features of this plugin include

  • Ability to change logo, title, text, headings in the Digital Warranty Card.
  • Ability to add items in the Product Description.
  • Ability to change the Date of Warranty.
  • Generate and Download the PDF of the Digital Warranty Card.
  • Multiple Designs for Warranty Cards
  • Preview Option to see PDF Warranty Card
  • Ability to choose Portrait / Landscape Mode for PDF
sections.installation:
The plugin is simple to install:

  • Download digital-warranty-card-generator1.2.zip
  • Unzip
  • Upload digital-wc-generator.zip directory to your /wp-content/plugins directory
  • Go to the plugin menu page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How to use the Digital Warranty Card Generator plugin?

  1. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  2. Then go to the WCards menu on WordPress admin.
  3. Fill the Details of your company, upload your logo and generate the Digital Warranty Card.

What is the benefit of using this plugin?

Digital Warranty Cards would help your business to grow more. One can use these cards to provide more assurance to the customer and also, it can also be used if you wanted to provide some recurring warranty to your Buyers. So, not only it will help to increase your sales but also provide more trust to your buyers.
sections.changelog:
1.2 – 17/Nov/2023

  • Updated WordPress libraries for the latest version
  • Tested with PHP 8.2

1.1 – 23/Dec/2021

  • Admin UI improved
  • Multiple Designs for Warranty Cards
  • Preview Option to see PDF
  • Ability to choose Portrait / Landscape Mode

1.0 – 03/Nov/2021

Initial release
